translation.en: [Jake] My generation, we were born into war.
translation.zh: 我们这一代出生于战争时期
体型巨大的妖怪正在攻打我们的世界
我们称它们为“巨兽”
它们来自缺口处

translation.en: A gateway to another dimension at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean.
translation.zh: 那是一道门户 可以通往太平洋底部的另一个维度

translation.en: They were sent by an alien race on the other side, the Precursors.
translation.zh: 它们是由缺口另一方的 外星人种族“先驱”派来的
我们极力反抗…
也打造了自己的怪兽
体型巨大的机器人“机甲战士”

translation.en: So big, they needed two pilots to run 'em.
translation.zh: 它们体积庞大 需要动用两名驾驶员来操控

translation.en: He sacrificed himself to help save the world.
translation.zh: 他为了拯救世界牺牲了自己的性命
我和我父亲不同

translation.en: It's been 10 years since we won the war
translation.zh: 自从我们打赢了战争…
关起了缺口处 已有十年时间
世界大部分已经复原

translation.en: But a few coastal cities never did.
translation.zh: 唯独几个沿海城市无法被重建

translation.en: And the world is still picking up the pieces.
translation.zh: 这世界仍在慢慢的重拾碎片

translation.en: But some of us live better in a broken world.
translation.zh: 但有一些人更适合居住在破碎的世界

translation.en: And squatting in half a mansion

translation.en: is better than paying for some crappy apartment.
translation.zh: 总好过为一所破旧的公寓交租 （泊岚公寓）

translation.en: Now, in the relief zones, you have to get creative.
translation.zh: 在救灾区 要生存就得耍一点小心机

translation.en: You have to hustle, or somebody else might eat your breakfast.
translation.zh: 若学不会诈取 就会被他人抢走早餐
以及属于你的饼干

translation.en: You know, out here, we place a different value on things.

translation.en: The Pan Pacific Defense Corps usually looks the other way
translation.zh: 泛太平洋防卫军团通常会对 轻微的违法行为置之不理…

translation.en: as long as you don't go poking around where you don't belong.

translation.en: And nothing pays more than stolen Jaeger tech.

translation.en: Plenty of nutcases out here trying to slap together their own Jaegers.

translation.en: But they need the parts to do it.

translation.en: So if you can steal what no one else can steal,

translation.en: you can live like a king.

translation.zh: 我对你姐姐一事感到难过
她是你家人收养的？

translation.en: Yeah, her family died during the Onibaba attack.
translation.zh: 是的 她的家人在内战时战死
我父亲收养了她

translation.en: She was my sister. My family.
translation.zh: 她是我姐姐 是我的家人

translation.en: Why are you out of uniform?
translation.zh: 你为何没穿着制服？

translation.en: Just had a lot on my mind after Sydney.
translation.zh: 发生悉尼的事件后 我有很多顾虑

translation.en: I guess I just wanted to be comfortable.
translation.zh: 我只想要感到自在

translation.en: Well, don't let Ranger Lambert see you in that.
translation.zh: 别让突击队员蓝伯看到你这副打扮

translation.en: He might take the stick out of his butt and beat you with it.
translation.zh: 他肯定会板起脸孔对你发飙

translation.en: I think I'm safe. It's wedged in there pretty tight.
translation.zh: 我不会有事的 他的脸孔无时无刻都是那副摸样
听说他们仍要使用萨拉

translation.en: Yeah. And I can't drift with her for some reason.
translation.zh: 是的 不知怎么的 我就是无法跟她一同进行飘逸

translation.en: All the other cadets have been training for years, and I just...
translation.zh: 其他学员已训练多年 而我却…

translation.en: I hate feeling like the slow kid.
translation.zh: 我讨厌自己跟不上他们的步伐
你得放轻松

translation.en: Or you're just grinding gears. I'll help you out.
translation.zh: 否则只会转牛角尖 我会帮助你的
-知道了 教练 -别那样称呼我
好吧 老师
专注

translation.en: We have to make a good connection.
translation.zh: 我们得建立良好的联系

translation.en: You can't do that if you're yappin' your gums.
translation.zh: 你一直喋喋不休是不行的
准备好了？
准备好了
好的

translation.en: Let's see if we're drift compatible.
translation.zh: 我们来看看彼此的脑电波是否兼容

translation.en: [Amara's father] Come on, Amara, get him!
translation.zh: 捉住他！
神经元负荷超载
专注 艾玛拉

translation.en: Remember, the stronger your connection, the better you fight.
translation.zh: 记住 你的连接越坚固就越有战斗力
没错 就是这样

translation.en: [Amara's father] Amara! Come on, jump! Jump to me, baby!
translation.zh: 艾玛拉 快跳 来我这里 宝贝！

translation.en: You have to, Amara, come on! Jump!
translation.zh: 你得这么做 艾玛拉 快跳！

translation.en: Amara! Don't hang on to the memory.
translation.zh: 艾玛拉！别被回忆牵绊

translation.en: Just let it flow right through you. Amara!
translation.zh: 试着放开心怀 艾玛拉！
艾玛拉 快跳！

translation.en: Yeah, come on. Get together. Ready? One, two...
translation.zh: 来吧 准备好了吗？一、二…
笑一个！
拍好了 你要看吗？
等一等

translation.en: Amara. Amara, you need to let it go. Amara!
translation.zh: 艾玛拉 你得释怀！

translation.en: Look, just listen to my voice!
translation.zh: 跟着我的声音！
艾玛拉！
-艾玛拉！ -爸爸！
艾玛拉 快跳！

translation.en: -Amara! We need to break the drift! -Jump to me! Come on!
translation.zh: -艾玛拉 我们必须终止飘逸！ -快跳来我这里 快啊！
我好害怕！

translation.en: Baby, I will catch you! I promise. Come on!
translation.zh: 宝贝 我会接住你的 我答应你 快！
艾玛拉！ 艾玛拉 听话！
快跳！
艾玛拉 快脱掉装备！
嘿
你没事吧？
我像是重回到现场
我能感受到
是的
我也感受到了

translation.en: [Nate] Jake, it's me. Are you there?
translation.zh: 杰克 是我 你在吗？
是的 我在

translation.en: Meet me in the lab right away. Marshal wants to see us.
translation.zh: 立刻来实验室与我会合 元帅要见我们
好的 我马上到
你没事吧？

translation.en: [Jake] What is it? [Marshal Quan] A message. From Mako.
translation.zh: -发生什么事？ -真子发送了一个信息

translation.en: [Hermann] She was trying to send it from her copter right before it went down.
translation.zh: 她在坠毁前从直升机上发送出来的

translation.en: It's a data package. High density.
translation.zh: 是个高密度的数据包

translation.en: Obsidian Fury was jamming comms. How could her signal get through?
translation.zh: 暴怒黑曜石当时正在干扰无线通信 她是如何接通信号的？

translation.en: It didn't. At least not intact.
translation.zh: 她并没有那么做 至少无法完整的接通
所以信号消失了？

translation.en: [Hermann] "Gone" is relative in the digital realm.
translation.zh: 所谓的“消失” 在数字领域里是个相对论

translation.en: By running a modified fractal algorithm,
translation.zh: 只要通过运行修改后的分形算法…

translation.en: I might be able to reconstruct a few megabytes.
translation.zh: 我或许能重建几兆字节
好了
那是一头巨兽吗？

translation.en: I'm checking against PPDC Kaiju archives.
translation.zh: 我正在对比防卫军团的巨兽档案
资料库里没有相同的数据

translation.en: Keep looking. Whatever this is, it was important to her.
translation.zh: 继续查 这无论是什么 对她而言是个重要的信息
我想查出原因

translation.en: And I want to know who was piloting that rogue Jaeger.
translation.zh: 我也要知道是谁 在驾驶那台失控的机甲战士

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles] Sorry I'm late. -I thought you were still in Sydney. -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.zh: 抱歉我迟到了 我以为你人还在悉尼
真是太好了

translation.en: Thought you'd be a little more enthusiastic, doc.
translation.zh: 我以为你会表现的更加兴奋 博士

translation.en: Yeah, no, I'm pumped. This is great.
translation.zh: 不 我确实很雀跃 这真是太好了

translation.en: It's just the timing of everything with the attack and all, feels a little...
translation.zh: 只不过刚刚发生了袭击事件…

translation.en: I was there. I know what happened.
translation.zh: 我当时就在现场 我知道发生了什么事
神经元连接终止

translation.en: -Yeah. Uh, I guess they do. -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: If you look at it sideways, and you squint,
translation.zh: 你若是从另一个角度来看 而且要非常仔细看…

translation.en: then maybe you could say that. Uh...
translation.zh: 或许才能那么说吧

translation.en: -I'm sorry, what is going on here? -[speaking Mandarin]
translation.zh: 抱歉 这里是怎么一回事？
48小时太赶了…
立刻去办

translation.en: Okay. Yeah. Not a problem. -That'll be fine. -[speaking Mandarin]
translation.zh: 好的 没问题

translation.en: You don't think there's a way? All right, well, then you're fired.
translation.zh: 你认为没有办法？好吧 你被解雇了
怎么样 现在办得到了吧？

translation.en: Or maybe you're promoted. I don't know. We'll see how it goes.
translation.zh: 或许会给你升职 我不知道 再说吧
快去想办法！
这个给我
嘿 亲爱的 我回来了

translation.en: Sorry I'm late. God, things were...
translation.zh: 抱歉 我迟到了 天啊…

translation.en: Things were crazy today with what happened in Sydney.
translation.zh: 发生过悉尼那件事后 全都一团糟

translation.en: All those people, it was not pretty.
translation.zh: 那些人真是不友善

translation.en: My boss almost got killed. That could've been bad.
translation.zh: 我老板差一点就被杀了 后果就不堪设想了

translation.en: Maybe. I guess, I don't know.
translation.zh: 或许吧 我不太确定

translation.en: That would've been great actually, that one is all over me.
translation.zh: 其实那会是件好事 她老是踩在我头上

translation.en: I mean, I can't get a break from her!
translation.zh: 搞得我一刻也不得闲！
看我在发牢骚 我们不谈公事了

translation.en: And enough about her, really, I should be focused on you.
translation.zh: 别提她了 我应该专注于你

translation.en: How about we have a little fun in the bedroom?
translation.zh: 我们不如在卧室里来点乐趣吧？
你的一天过得如何？

translation.en: Oh, that's great. Yeah, that's exciting.
translation.zh: 太好了 是的 太精彩了
什么？
能让我开心的东西？

translation.en: Well, [clears throat] what can I say?
translation.zh: 我还能说什么？
你真是能看透我的心思
有上百名警员…
他们称它为暴怒黑曜石

translation.en: There's never been a rogue like this.
translation.zh: 从未出现过像这样的失控机甲战士

translation.en: News feed said they were posting a dozen Jaegers at the memorial.
translation.zh: 新闻有提到会派十几台机甲战士 出席追悼会

translation.en: When I die, I want that many to send me off.
translation.zh: 在我死后 我也要有那么多人来送我一程

translation.en: Your pop's gonna make you work with boobs when you wash out.
translation.zh: 你要是在这里失败 你父亲肯定会叫你去修复胸部

translation.en: Jaegers do not show up when the boob guy dies.
translation.zh: 机甲战士才不会 出席修复胸部的人葬礼

translation.en: Wait, your dad works with boobs?
translation.zh: 等等 你父亲是修复胸部的？

translation.en: He's a plastic surgeon. He doesn't just work with...
translation.zh: 他是一名整型医生 不只是修复胸部…

translation.en: I'm not gonna wash out. I'm gonna be a pilot.
translation.zh: 我也不会失败 我要成为一名驾驶员

translation.en: Still. You die, meh, I post one Jaeger at your funeral.
translation.zh: 无论如何 你若死了 我会派一台机甲战士去参加你的葬礼
或许是半个机甲战士吧

translation.en: I heard that's where they found Amara. In half a Jaeger.
translation.zh: 听说他们就是这样找到艾玛拉的 在半个机甲战士内
那是一台完整的机甲战士
只不过体型不大…
维多利亚
越大才越有实力
去你的
你说什么？
去你的
-我有说对吗？ -是的

translation.en: I worked every day of my life to be here. You didn't do anything.
translation.zh: 我努力很久才能来到这里 你什么也没做

translation.en: You were just picked up off the street, like garbage!
translation.zh: 你只不过是街上捡来的 就像垃圾！
各位 别这样！

translation.en: You know where I learned that?
translation.zh: 你知道我是从哪学来的？

translation.en: On the streets, you big, dumb...
translation.zh: 在街上学会的 你这个又大又蠢的…
突击队员来了！
-是她攻击我的！ -她根本不配来这里！
我不在乎！

translation.en: You know, when I first joined the Corps, I was just like you.
translation.zh: 你们知道吗 我刚加入军队时 也跟你们一样
甚至更糟 那时候的我谁都不是

translation.en: But that woman we laid to rest today, Mako Mori,
translation.zh: 但是我们今天下葬的那位女士 森真子…
她曾说过“无论你是谁…

translation.en: the minute you enter this program, you join a family.
translation.zh: 你一旦加入这个计划 就等于加入一个大家庭

translation.en: And no matter what they do,
translation.zh: 无论他们犯下什么错…

translation.en: no matter how stupid they may act sometimes,
translation.zh: 或是行为有多么愚蠢…

translation.en: you forgive 'em, and you move on."
translation.zh: 你必须原谅他们 向前看”

translation.en: So you start believing that. In here.
translation.zh: 你们得学会相信这句话

translation.en: And you'll start believing it in a Jaeger.
translation.zh: 才能相信自己 有能力驾驭一台机甲战士
嘿

translation.en: Marshal's looking for you guys. Says Gottlieb found something.
translation.zh: 元帅有事找你们 他说葛里布博士发现了新信息
我没找到信息 但找出了一个位置

translation.en: Severnaya Zemlya. Off Siberia's Taymyr Peninsula.
translation.zh: 北地群岛 在俄罗斯西伯利亚的泰梅尔半岛
-北地群岛有什么？ -现在什么也没有了

translation.en: A facility roughly in this location
translation.zh: 之前在靠近这个位置曾有一座设施…

translation.en: was used to manufacture Jaeger power cores earlier in the war,
translation.zh: 被用来制造战争早期的 机甲战士能量核心…

translation.en: but it was decommissioned years ago.
translation.zh: 但在多年前已被废除

translation.en: Why would Mako be trying to tell us about an abandoned factory
translation.zh: 真子为何要告诉我们这个…
偏僻的废弃工厂？

translation.en: Sir, permission to take Gipsy Avenger to see what the hell's out there.
translation.zh: 长官 请批准驾驶 吉普赛复仇者前往查看
扫描中

translation.en: [sighs] Looks like Mako's message was a dead end.
translation.zh: 看来真子的信息是个死胡同
这地方已经成了废区
不 等等
我接收到一些怪异的信号
小心！
攻击它的脚！

translation.en: -[alarm blaring] -We gotta get out of here!
translation.zh: 我们得逃离这里！
离子动力大炮！

translation.en: I think we pissed him off.
translation.zh: 我想我们激怒了它
好极了
还记得我们以前的招式吗？
当然
它好像受伤了！
拔掉它的电源核心！
警告
警告
暴怒黑曜石的驾驶员…

translation.en: get the hell out of your Conn-Pod.
translation.zh: 立即离开你的控制驾驶舱
那是什么玩意？
绝对是巨兽

translation.en: A secondary brain used to control the hindquarters.
translation.zh: 次要的大脑是用于控制后躯

translation.en: How'd they get into our world?
translation.zh: 它们是如何进入我们的世界？

translation.en: There hasn't been a breach in 10 years.
translation.zh: 在这十年内已经没有缺口
若是有也肯定会被传感器感应到

translation.en: I don't think there was a breach.
translation.zh: 我不认为出现了缺口

translation.en: Kaiju flesh has a distinct radioactive half-life signature.
translation.zh: 巨兽的肉体有独特的放射性生命标志
唯独巨兽宇宙才有
这个样本却没有

translation.en: Okay, so, you're saying that it's from our universe?
translation.zh: 你的意思是这来自我们的宇宙？

translation.en: The genetic fingerprints indicate distinctly terrestrial modification techniques,
translation.zh: 遗传指纹明确显示出 在陆地进行过修改技术…

translation.en: probably engineered from Kaiju flesh left over from the war.
translation.zh: 很有可能是利用战争后 遗留的巨兽肉体改良的
这不是先驱怪兽的手法
是人类做的

translation.en: Oh, my God. That hunk of slimy crap was piloting Obsidian Fury?
translation.zh: 我的天 那一大块黏糊糊的玩意 竟然在驾驶暴怒黑曜石？

translation.en: -[Amara] We gotta get a look inside. -Inside?
translation.zh: -我们得到里头看一看 -里头？
那玩意有一半的巨兽基因
走吧 各位

translation.en: When are we ever gonna get a chance to see something like this again?
translation.zh: 我们何时才会有这样的机会？
不会再有了 永远都不要有

translation.en: You guys can stay here. I'm going.
translation.zh: 你们留在这里吧 我自己进去
不行 艾玛拉！

translation.en: [Suresh] Guys, guys, we should not be in here.
translation.zh: 各位 我们不应该来这里的

translation.en: It's fused all the way through the system.
translation.zh: 它跟整个系统融为一体
就像是…肌肉组织

translation.en: [Jinhai] That's how it was able to move like it did. Cool.
translation.zh: 所以才能行动自如 好酷
是啊 真酷

translation.en: Working with boobs is sounding better and better.
translation.zh: 修复胸部此刻听起来像是不错的差事
把灯光照向那里

translation.en: Yeah, let's just go yank on the guts of the weird-ass Kaiju killbot.
translation.zh: 用刀割它的内脏 你还能干出更奇怪的事吗？
那是什么？
好像是某种…
锦海！

translation.en: -I told you not to yank on those. -Go get help! Go!
translation.zh: -我都说了不要碰这些 -快去找人来帮忙 快！
天啊 我们闯祸了！

translation.en: This goes way past what she did. [Marshal Quan] The decision has been made.
translation.zh: -这项处罚太严厉了 -我们已作出决定

translation.en: Security will take it from here. We're done.
translation.zh: 剩下的交给保安人员吧 我们谈完了
锦海还好吗？

translation.en: He's got some scarring, but, yeah, he'll live.
translation.zh: 他会留下疤痕 但没什么大碍
元帅罚他留校察看

translation.en: Meilin and Suresh, too. They blink wrong, all of 'em are out.
translation.zh: 梅林和苏莱许也受到处分 他们只要再犯下任何错误就会被开除

translation.en: No, it's not their fault. I talked them into it.
translation.zh: 不 这不是他们的错 是我怂恿他们的

translation.en: I'm sorry, I tried to talk to the Marshal,
translation.zh: 抱歉 我尝试跟元帅理论…

translation.en: but you're dismissed from the program.
translation.zh: 但他们已决定要开除你
我从来也不属于这里
是这样吗？

translation.en: You know, I used to say the same thing a long time ago.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 我在很久前也说过同样的话

translation.en: But I actually didn't wanna be here.
translation.zh: 但我是真的不想待在这里
这个想法至今仍没改变过
你为何要加入军队？

translation.en: We were at war. And my dad was leading the charge, and I thought
translation.zh: 我们当时正在打仗 我父亲带领着军队上阵…

translation.en: maybe I could see more of him.
translation.zh: 我以为这么做或许能多见到他
甚至可以跟他一同飘逸驾驶

translation.en: Well, one night, me and Nate got into it.
translation.zh: 直到一天晚上 我和奈特发生了争执

translation.en: It was over something stupid. I can't even remember what.
translation.zh: 为了很愚蠢的琐碎事 我现在根本记不起是什么

translation.en: So, I climbed in an old Mark IV,
translation.zh: 于是我偷偷爬上一台机甲战士…

translation.en: just to show him I didn't need him to be a great pilot.
translation.zh: 只为了向他证明 我独自一人也能当个优秀的驾驶员
-那样做确实很愚蠢 -是的
你驾驶了多远距离？

translation.en: About seven steps. Take or leave.
translation.zh: 大概七步吧
你真实驾驶了多远？

translation.en: About two steps, and I blacked out from the strain.
translation.zh: 只走了两步 我接着因为过劳而昏了过去

translation.en: And the first thing I saw when I woke up was my dad,
translation.zh: 我醒来后看到我父亲…

translation.en: just standing right in front of me, looking stern.
translation.zh: 一脸严肃的站在我面前
他说了什么？

translation.en: He said I was out of the program.
translation.zh: 他说我被开除了

translation.en: He said I didn't deserve to be in a Jaeger. Look, he said a lot of things.
translation.zh: 他还说我没有资格驾驶机甲战士 他也说了很多其他事

translation.en: A year later, my dad was gone.
translation.zh: 我父亲在一年后就过世了

translation.en: And I didn't get a chance to prove him wrong.
translation.zh: 我也没机会向他证明自己

translation.en: More importantly, I didn’t get a chance to prove it to myself.
translation.zh: 更重要的是 我连证明给自己看的机会也没有
你听好了

translation.en: Don't let what other people think of you define who you are.
translation.zh: 不要因为其他人的看法而局限自己

translation.en: You won't like where that takes you. Do you understand?
translation.zh: 你不会喜欢那种后果 听明白了吗？
勇敢的撑下去

translation.en: And you might just be as good-looking as me in this type of situation.
translation.zh: 你或许会变得跟我一样迷人
我是说真的

translation.en: This face is set up well. Beauty is a burden.
translation.zh: 这真是一张俊脸 美貌是一种累赘
你不会有事的
邵氏企业
什么？

translation.en: Obsidian Fury has tech in it made by Shao Industries.
translation.zh: 暴怒黑曜石的零件出自邵氏企业
那是不可能的

translation.en: Jules and her team scanned every centimeter of that Jaeger.
translation.zh: 朱尔斯与她的团队 已经仔细扫描过那台机甲战士

translation.en: Insulating meta materials wound counter-clockwise in the shunt cabling.
translation.zh: 被隔离的电磁材料 会在分流电缆中以逆时针方向操作

translation.en: Shao's the only company that winds them that way.
translation.zh: 邵氏是唯一用那种操作模式的公司

translation.en: Amara, are you sure about what you're telling me right now? Yes.
translation.zh: 艾玛拉 你确定吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I stole a ton to make Scrapper.

translation.en: I thought it might be important.

是的 谢谢你

translation.en: Yeah, not that we know of.

translation.en: Cabling could have been stolen, just like in Amara's Jaeger.

translation.en: We're gonna need more than that to connect Fury to Shao.

纽顿呢？

translation.en: He'd have access to the internal records, the shipping manifests.
translation.zh: 他肯定能够接触到 内部记录和航运清单

translation.en: All right, go see him. Keep a low profile.

我被发配任务了？ 终于等到这一天了！

translation.en: We'll take what we know to the Marshal.

translation.en: [Jinhai] I'm sorry. You don't deserve this.

这全是我一个人的错
都怪我连累了大家
艾玛拉
你打造的下一台机甲战士…
一定要建造一个大型的
系统已上线

translation.en: -And we have delivery at 100%, people. -System online.
translation.zh: -发送率是百分之百 各位！ -系统上线

translation.en: A hundred percent! That's the way that it's done, okay?
translation.zh: 百分之百 做的真好！

translation.en: I told you we could do it, and we did it!
translation.zh: 我说过一定会成功的！
系统故障
无人机375号失联！
为什么？
快去查看！

translation.en: [Marshal Quan] We'll take what we know to the council in person.
translation.zh: 我们会亲自把这些数据交给委员会
准备运输工具
等一等
快去操控吉普赛 快去！

translation.en: [over pa] All pilots, man your Jaegers and engage hostiles!
translation.zh: 所有驾驶员 立即操控机甲战士与敌方交锋！

translation.en: Okay, you got this. You cool? Yeah, super cool. Just stay calm...
translation.zh: 你可以的 知道吗？保持冷静

translation.en: I know! I'm heading up. I'm heading right...
translation.zh: 我知道！我这就去…

translation.en: Hermann. What are you doing here? How'd you get in here?
translation.zh: 赫曼 你怎么会在这里？ 你是如何进入的？
我也是防卫军团的一员

translation.en: And besides, everyone else seems a little bit preoccupied
translation.zh: 再说 这里的每个人 都忙着自己的事…

translation.en: with the killer drones your boss just set off!
translation.zh: 尤其是因为你的老板 刚刚派出了杀人无人机！
-她利用了你 -不是的

translation.en: She lured you with money and a fancy title. No. No way.
translation.zh: -她用钱财和名利来诱惑你 -不是这样的

translation.en: While you were basking in the glow,
translation.zh: 当你沉醉于名利的当下…

translation.en: she took your research and she twisted it.
translation.zh: 她盗取了你的研究并加以改良

translation.en: Help me stop her, Newton. Help me save the world like old times.
translation.zh: 帮助我阻止她吧 纽顿 像过去那样帮我拯救这个世界

translation.en: All right, technically, you were helping me last time.
translation.zh: 严格来说 上一次你不过是在协助我
我们得搞清楚这一点

translation.en: Fine. Help me help you save the world.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就帮助我 好让我能协助你拯救这世界
-你的看法如何？ -我的回答是…
我的回答是…别开枪！

translation.en: God damn it, why can't I get this language?
translation.zh: 该死的 我为何就是搞不懂这个语言？
-发生什么事了？ -艾玛拉！那些是机甲战士吗？

translation.en: No, they're drones from Shao Industries.
translation.zh: 不 那些是邵氏企业的无人机

translation.en: -What are they doing? -I don't know! They just went crazy!
translation.zh: -他们在做什么？ -我不知道！他们失控了！
立即疏散！

translation.en: Get back to your quarters right now!
translation.zh: 立刻回到你们的宿舍！
-是 长官！ -快走！

translation.en: Go! Get the hell out of here! Come on! Go, go!
translation.zh: 快离开这里 动作快！

translation.en: Come on. Come on, come on. Get up.
translation.zh: 来吧 起来
不是吧？
偏偏选在这个时候？
赫曼！
我需要你来帮一点小忙！

translation.en: Next time, why don't you learn how to use a gun? Take that!
translation.zh: 你下次不如先学会开枪吧？去你的！
真是恶劣的人！
-谢谢你 纽顿 -好的

translation.en: I'd hug you if I didn't have a rule about public displays of affection.
translation.zh: 我要不是讨厌当众献殷勤 肯定会抱紧你
-没关系 -管他的

translation.en: Okay! All right. If you're done groping me?
translation.zh: 好了！够了 你摸够了吗？

translation.en: Let's take care of the drones, right? All right, good.
translation.zh: 我们去对付那些无人机吧？

translation.en: Everyone, get out of the lab or I will shoot you!
translation.zh: 大家立刻离开研究室 否则我就开枪射你！

translation.en: -I will shoot you twice! -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.zh: 我会开枪射你两次！
你正式被解雇了 快滚！

translation.en: What do we do? How do we stop this?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么做才能阻止这一切？
赫曼 可以通过系统的后门设备
-来连接什么？ -连接无人机的副程序
我特意加上副程序…

translation.en: just in case I wanna get in here and poke around down the road.
translation.zh: 以免我在未来得窥探这个程序
真是个狡猾的混蛋
可不是？
你刚刚做了什么？

translation.en: What I've been planning the last 10 years.
translation.zh: 我筹备了十年的计划
我要让世界灭亡
所有驾驶员注意…
多处检测出违反程序操控

translation.en: Drones in the field are opening multiple breaches across the Pacific Rim!
translation.zh: 无人机在环太平洋 引起了众多系统裂缝！
为什么？
你为何要这么做？

translation.en: Why would I do this? Hmm.
translation.zh: 我为何要这么做？

translation.en: I guess I wouldn't. Not normally, not really my style.
translation.zh: 我想平时的我确实不会这么做 这不太像是我的作风

translation.en: Yeah, no, I don't know, maybe I hate you all
translation.zh: 我不知道 或许是因为我恨死你们所有人…

translation.en: for treating me like an insignificant, little joke of a man.
translation.zh: 总是把我当成笑话看待

translation.en: Maybe that's why he did it, Hermann. I did it.
translation.zh: 他或许是因为这个原因吧 赫曼 我指的是我
没错…
就是这样
问题就出在这里

translation.en: I'm just not feeling totally myself these days.
translation.zh: 我最近总是感觉自己哪里不对劲
你
是先驱怪兽搞的鬼

translation.en: Very good, Hermann, you figured it out.
translation.zh: 很好 赫曼 你猜对了

translation.en: And as usual, a step behind.
translation.zh: 但一如往常 你总是慢一拍
纽顿
-你是一个好人 -不是的 赫曼

translation.en: -You must stop. -No, there's no point in fighting them.
translation.zh: -你得停止这一切 -不 我没办法对抗他们

translation.en: -You must fight back. -I'm not strong enough, Hermann.
translation.zh: -你一定要反击 -我不够坚强 赫曼

translation.en: -Please. You must! -I am not strong enough.
translation.zh: -拜托你 纽顿 你一定得这么做！ -我说了我不够坚强
他不够坚强！

translation.en: None of you are strong enough!
translation.zh: 你们没一个人够坚强！
我很抱歉 赫曼
他们控制了我
嘿 老板

translation.en: The hell are you doing here? I told you to get to quarters!
translation.zh: 你们还在这里做什么？ 我叫你们回宿舍！

translation.en: All the doors are blocked! What do we do?

translation.en: I mean, 38% of your company is fully automated.

translation.en: It really wasn't very hard to reallocate a little over here
translation.zh: 要动一点手脚…
确实不难

translation.en: And slip in a little Kaiju surprise without you noticing.

translation.en: [Hermann] Stop! Wait, wait, wait. Newt's not in control of himself!

translation.en: It isn't him! It's the Precursors.

translation.en: They must've infected his mind when we drifted with the Kaiju.

闭嘴！

translation.en: Stay here! We're gonna try and get to Gipsy.
translation.zh: 留在这里！我们得尝试到吉普赛那里
你准备好了吗？
还没！你呢？
-还没 数到三就跑 -好极了
一、二…
喂 有人吗？
葛里布？
杰克 谢天谢地！

translation.en: We're under attack. You need to force Liwen

translation.en: -to shut down the drones! -It isn't her.

translation.en: It isn't Liwen. It was Newt.

他被先驱怪兽侵入了
他们控制了他的大脑

translation.en: Gottlieb, can you get him to disable the drones?

没办法 他逃跑了

translation.en: -Gottlieb, shut them down. -[Liwen speaking in Mandarin]

translation.en: It's trying to lock you out.

反馈循环

translation.en: [Jake] Gottlieb, what the hell is going on? Gottlieb!

translation.en: Gottlieb, shut them down or we're gonna die!

快关闭它们！
成功了！
丽雯已经关闭了无人机

translation.en: The breaches are closed. I repeat, the breaches are closed.

糟糕

有三头巨兽逃脱了

两个属于第四号类别 另一个属于第五号类别
收到
快回到基地

-你们没事吧？ -是的 长官

translation.en: All right, what do we got?

translation.en: The reports are still coming in,

translation.en: but drones took out Jaegers and Shatterdomes across the Rim.

translation.en: All right. How many Jaegers do we have here?

还能操作的？只剩吉普赛复仇者
-没了？ -是的

translation.en: Okay. We need more Jaegers up and running or this is gonna be a short fight.

translation.en: Even if we can, all of our other pilots are either dead or severely injured.

translation.en: One disaster at a time. Let's just focus on those Jaegers.

小不点 过来这里

translation.en: I need you to help Jules with the repairs. Can you do that?

translation.en: I thought I was kicked out.

我现在重新雇用你

translation.en: She's pretty good at turning junk into Jaegers.

你没意见吧？
当然没有

translation.en: and not a lot of time.
translation.zh: 但时间紧凑
有人来了！
我带人来帮忙了！
白蛇怪兽、伯劳刺怪兽…
以及大块头雷神怪兽

translation.en: I took the liberty of assigning the designations.

translation.en: Well, the spiky guy and the big idiot

translation.en: are moving away from the cities and towards the ocean.

这意味着什么？

translation.en: Maybe they're trying to link up with Hakuja in the East China Sea.

translation.en: Yeah, I bet Newt would know what they're up to,

translation.en: if we can get it out of him.

translation.en: Yeah, we'd have to find him first.
translation.zh: 没错 但我们得先找到他

translation.en: Any Jaegers closer to those Kaiju than us?

translation.en: What was left of the Chin-do and Sakhalinsk domes tried to intercept.

关键字是“尝试过”

translation.en: I'm afraid we're on our own. [Nate] There's gotta be something here.
translation.zh: -我们恐怕得孤军奋战了 -这里肯定藏着什么

translation.en: Something in the East China Sea.

translation.en: Maybe that's not where they're headed.

translation.en: Pull up a map of Kaiju movement from the war.

上载数据至主屏幕

translation.en: What, do you know something we don't?

translation.en: You said we need to understand our enemy's objective
translation.zh: 你曾说过必须彻底了解敌人的目的…
才能打败他们

translation.en: What if the Kaiju weren't blindly attacking our cities during the war?
translation.zh: 要是巨兽在大战中 不是盲目的攻打我们的城市呢？

translation.en: What if we were just in their way?

就在这个位置
日本富士山

translation.en: Extrapolate for Hakuja, Shrikethorn and Raijin.
translation.zh: 推断白蛇怪兽、伯劳刺怪兽 以及雷神怪兽的目的地
富士山？为何是那里？
稀土元素

translation.en: Mount Fuji is a volcano rich in rare earth elements.
translation.zh: 富士山是一座富有稀土元素的火山

translation.en: Kaiju blood reacts extremely violently with rare earth elements
translation.zh: 巨兽的血一旦接触稀土元素 就会有强烈的反应…

translation.en: is the basis of my fuel-thruster experiments. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 这是我的燃料推进器实验的 研究基础 请让一让

translation.en: -Whoa. That sounds bad. That's bad, right? -Very.
translation.zh: -那听起来很不妥 对吗？ -非常不妥

translation.en: Mount Fuji's active. A geological pressure point.
translation.zh: 富士山仍然活跃 是地质的压力点

translation.en: Based on the blood to mass ratio of the Kaiju,
translation.zh: 根据巨兽的血液与质量比率…

translation.en: the reaction would cause a cascade event,
translation.zh: 这个反作用会导致连锁事件…

translation.en: igniting the Ring of Fire around the Pacific Rim.
translation.zh: 点燃太平洋周围的火山地区

translation.en: Billions of tons of toxic gas and ash will spew into the atmosphere,
translation.zh: 数十亿吨的有毒气体 和灰烬将会喷入大气层…
使所有的生物灭亡
并完成地球环境外星化…
变得适合先驱怪兽居住

translation.en: We can't let them reach Mount Fuji.
translation.zh: 我们不能让他们抵达富士山

translation.en: I'm gonna check with Jules for Jaeger repairs.
translation.zh: 我跟朱尔斯 去查看机甲战士的修复进展

translation.en: Even if we had a hundred Jaegers, there's no way to intercept in time.
translation.zh: 我们即便有一百台机甲战士 也无法及时阻止他们
你研发的推进器呢？

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. They're not ready.
translation.zh: 不行 那还未打造完成
你能办到吗？

translation.en: Well, in theory, maybe, with your help.
translation.zh: 理论上说 若有你的帮忙或许可以

translation.en: Gottlieb, what does that mean, "in theory"?

在今时今日…
意味着我们办得到

translation.en: [electronic voice] Power partially restored in sectors two...
translation.zh: 第二区的电力已部分恢复

translation.en: Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo and Bracer Phoenix are good to go.
translation.zh: 剑弩雅典娜、誓死守卫者 以及铁腕凤凰已修复完毕

translation.en: It's not a lot to work with.
translation.zh: 我们的兵力太薄弱了

translation.en: Liwen can patch some Fury tech into Gipsy that might help.
translation.zh: 丽雯把部分的暴怒黑曜石威力 灌入吉普赛复仇者 这会有所帮助
-部署好我们现有的兵力 准备出发 -好的
你得活着回来
你也是
我有点糊涂了
我们专注于眼前的战争吧

translation.en: We got four Jaegers against two Category-Fours and a Fiver.
translation.zh: 我们得用四台机甲战士对抗 两个第四类别和一个第五类别的巨兽
但这总好过只有一台吉普赛复仇者
我们仍需驾驶员
我们有他们
该死的

translation.en: If my dad was here, he'd probably give you a big speech.
translation.zh: 我父亲若还在 或许会来一段演说
好让你感觉自己无人能敌
但我不是我父亲

translation.en: I'm not a hero like he was.
translation.zh: 我当不了像他这样的英雄人物
或是罗利贝克特…
还有森真子

translation.en: But they didn't start out that way.
translation.zh: 但他们并非一开始就如此优秀

translation.en: They started out as cadets, just like you.
translation.zh: 他们也和你们一样 从学员开始

translation.en: We remember them as giants because they stood tall.
translation.zh: 我们会向他们看齐 是因为他们面对困境时无畏无惧
也因为他们团结一致

translation.en: It doesn't matter who your parents are,
translation.zh: 你们的父母是谁并不重要…

translation.en: where you came from, who believed in you and who didn't.
translation.zh: 或是你来自哪里 是否有人相信你
我们现在是一家人

translation.en: And we are Earth's last defense.
translation.zh: 也是这个地球最后一道防守

translation.en: This is our time, this is our chance to make a difference.
translation.zh: 这是属于我们的时机 是我们能够做出改变的机会

translation.en: Now let's mount up and get it done!
translation.zh: 我们出发对抗眼前的困难吧！
你们听明白了？
是的 长官！
机甲战士驾驶员 你们听明白了？
是的 长官！
你们听明白了？
是的 长官！

translation.en: Now help me save the world.
translation.zh: 现在去帮我拯救世界吧
我们出发
系统已上线
启动神经元联系
建立神经元连接
艾玛拉 快跳！

是否已准备好进行任务
